name: 2CODE Online
overview:
2CODE Online, is a small software shop which provides remote web development services for small businesses of US & Canada.

We can offer you:

  1. Competitive hourly rates.
  2. Excellent English communication skills
  3. A time zone that is similar to most of US & Canada locations
  4. Experienced Senior developers (+12 years on average)
  5. Completely bilingual and UNACCENTED account/project manager.

We are the only offshore IT Start-up that provides an account manager, a technical leader AND at LEAST ONE Senior developer for every single project. That means, when you work with us, you are working with at least a three people team for 60% of the price of just ONE local freelance developer.

Here is our complete list of services:

  • Custom Software Development for Microsoft .NET Technologies (C#, VB, SQL Server, SharePoint, DotNetNuke) .
    • Migrations & Upgrades
    • Maintenance & Support -Online Marketing (Surveys, SEO, Newsletters,Copywriting, etc)
    • .AR domain registrations

To learn more about 2CODE Online, please, visit www.2codeonline.com .
